summary.span: 提供目前使用者相關資訊的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開屬性和方法所`My.User`物件提供存取目前使用者的相關資訊。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. 「 目前使用者 」 的意義與 Windows 及 Web 應用程式之間稍有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 應用程式中，目前使用者是執行應用程式的使用者。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. Web 應用程式中目前的使用者是存取應用程式的使用者。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. `My.User`屬性也可存取目前的使用者。The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主體的物件代表使用者的安全性內容，包括該使用者的識別以及使用者所屬的任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 對於 Windows 應用程式，這個屬性會提供相同的功能屬性。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. Web 應用程式，這個屬性會提供相同的功能屬性所傳回的物件屬性。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 對於 Windows 應用程式中，只有專案建置**Windows 應用程式**範本初始化`My.User`預設物件。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在其他所有的 Windows 專案類型，您必須初始化`My.User`藉由呼叫物件方法明確或指派值給。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > `My.User`物件無法報告目前的 Windows 使用者，因為這些作業系統不支援登入之使用者的概念，當執行在 Windows 95 及 Windows 98 的相關資訊。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 您必須實作自訂驗證，才能使用`My.User`這些作業系統上的物件...You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems.. ## Examples 這個範例會檢查應用程式是否使用 Windows 或自訂驗證，並使用該資訊來剖析`My.User.Name`屬性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開屬性和方法所`My.User`物件提供存取目前使用者的相關資訊。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user.

summary.span: 取得或設定 Principal 物件，表示目前使用者。

span.span: Gets or sets the principal object representing the current user.

value.span: 物件，代表目前的使用者。

span.span: An object representing the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在物件，此屬性包裝屬性屬性。In the object, this property wraps the property of the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more detailed information, see the property.
